Class Ai

  • java.lang.Object
    • Ai

  • public class Ai
extends java.lang.Object
    Ai class either computes or raffles the next move for computer.
    Version:
    2018.1204
    Author:
    Heikki Kangas

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static Cell[] emptyCells
      Cell array for storing empty cells of the GameLogic.gameArea.
      private static char[][][][] possibleMoves
      Has two possible moves for each empty cell in the GameLogic.gameArea, one with player's char and one with computer's char.
      private static java.util.Random rng
      Random for raffling random cells.

      • Ai

        public Ai()

    • Method Detail

      • getBothPlayersPossibleMoves

        private static void getBothPlayersPossibleMoves()
        Updates possibleMoves with all the possible moves. Checks for empty cells in game area, then creates two game areas per empty cell, one for player move and another for computer move.

      • nextMove

        public static void nextMove()
        Computes the next move for computer. If there's no computerchars in the game area one will be inserted at random location. If there's at least one computerchar in the game area, searches for winning move. If no winning move found, checks if there's player winning move available to block. If no winning moves are found it will insert computerchar to random location.

      • getRandomEmptyCell

        private static Cell getRandomEmptyCell()
        Returns Cell with random coordinates.
        Returns:
        Cell with random coordinates.
